message.text: [ACTION]You see a very nervous man.

reply.text: Hello. Are you [NPC_NAME]?
Can you tell me again where was the last caravan raided?

message.text: Last caravan was raided in sector VAR(DF_SECTOR)
Hello again [PLAYER_NAME], were you able to find the last crystal?

reply.text: Hello [NPC_NAME], yes, we now have averything we need to stop that pirate ship.

message.text: That's good news. Because if you don't stop it, my business will be ruined.

reply.text: Can you tell me where was the last caravan raided?

message.text: Sure, last caravan was raided in sector [SECTOR]

reply.text: Thanks. Wish me luck!

message.text: Good luck. Turn those bastards to space dust!
Hi [PLAYER_NAME]. Hope the search for the third crystal is going well.

reply.text: I'm working on it.
Can you please remind me, where's the Empire base?

message.text: The Empire main base is located in sector VAR(EMPIRE_HQ_SECTOR)
Good, I hope that now KeK can reclaim that asteroid belt.

reply.text: Did you find any information about the third piece?

message.text: As a matter of fact I did. Though it's not 100% accurate.
I did a search in our database, and found some interesting old reports.

reply.text: What do they say?

message.text: They say that we were going to check out an asteroid belt,
that was supposed to have an asteroid with a HAK86 in it.
But when we arrived the belt was clean picked.

reply.text: So, who mined it?

message.text: We scanned the sector and found trails of Emperial ships.

reply.text: So you think that Empire might have another crystal?

message.text: I think they might. And this is the only info I was able to find.

reply.text: I guess I'll have to check it out then.

message.text: Their base is located in sector [SECTOR]
[PLAYER_NAME], Did you already get the second crystal?

reply.text: No, not yet.
Yes, I have it.
Can you remind me please where is that asteroid belt?

message.text: Well then get on to it!

reply.text: I'm working on it.

message.text: The asteroid belt is located at sector VAR(B_HQ_SECTOR)
Yes? Who are you and what do you want? Cant you see I'm busy here!
[ACTION]You hear a voice in the background: 6occ, KTO-TO Orpa6uJl KOPOBAH nr.8!
Shit! Another one of my caravans just got raided.
Unbelievable... This is the 5th one already!
And the worst part is, I have no idea who's doing this, and how!

reply.text: I think I might know what is going on.

message.text: Oh really? And who are you to know anything about this?

reply.text: Let me explain...

message.text: [ACTION]The man skeptically raises his eyebrow but is listening

reply.text: [SKIP]Explain to him the deal with the stolen prototype

message.text: So, you think that these pirates are using this prototype ship to raid my caravans?

reply.text: Yes, I think this is what's happening to them.

message.text: OK then, how do we stop it?

reply.text: The USC needs 3 HAK86 crystals. They think that you have them.

message.text: HAK86! Do you even know how rare this thing is?

reply.text: Yes, but it's the only way we can stop that ship.

message.text: In any case, I only have one piece. And a potential location for another one.

reply.text: Well, that's a start.
Well, that's a start.

message.text: Alright, I will order to transfer the one I have to your ship.

reply.text: Good, and the second one?

message.text: Alright, I will order to transfer the one I have to your ship.

reply.text: Good, and the second one?

message.text: I have information about an asteroid belt that has an asteroid with HAK86 inside.
But there's a problem, that belt was recently occupied by pirates.
If you can clear them out. You can get one more crystal.

reply.text: I think it's worth a shot. Where is it?
I think it's worth a shot. Where is it?

message.text: The asteroid belt is located at sector [SECTOR]
The asteroid belt is located at sector VAR(B_HQ_SECTOR)
